education.degree_title: Associate of Applied Science in Secretarial Science

work_experience.responsibilities: Provide administrative support in HR and retirement benefits. Assist participants with Medicare/Medicaid inquiries, eligibility, and coverage. Process retirees’ pension and benefits calculations. Handle calls and administrative tasks, prepare meeting notes, and work on special projects involving tax forms, payments, and retiree education.

Supported bilingual unit and assisted new hires. Facilitated care coordination for Medicaid members, handled administrative support for directors, and provided customer service assistance to ensure satisfaction and compliance.

Performed advanced, diversified, and confidential secretarial and administrative duties for call center directors and executives. Managed correspondence, calls, travel arrangements, and reports. Assisted with claims, member issues, and escalations, and coached new hires on phone etiquette and quality monitoring.

Provided administrative support to center managers for inbound and outbound units and HR. Managed reports, scheduling, training material preparation, and invoices. Maintained personnel records and conducted phone interviews for bilingual candidates.

Served as consumer advocate to the CEO, liaising with the Better Business Bureau and Attorney General offices. Resolved over 350 customer complaints monthly, achieving 95% satisfactory resolutions and retaining 90% of customers.

certifications.name: Certificate of Excellent Award for Self Development

projects.name: Retirement Benefits Administration Project
projects.description: Processed retiree pension payments and educated retirees on payment options and benefit eligibility.

projects.name: Customer Service Quality Improvement
projects.description: Mentored team members on phone etiquette and methods to achieve high quality monitoring scores.

awards.name: Certificate of Excellent Award
awards.description: Received for going above and beyond call of duty and self-development.

voluntary experience.description: Served as church’s Director of Multi-media, real-time translator, and bookkeeper assistant.
